title: No Salt.. but please Riot, when is URF?
body:
I know you post updates about upcoming rotations etc, but if they are indeed rotations, you should know when the next URF mode is scheduled?
An overwhelming majority of players really want to play this fun mode, if there is even an estimate of the month this year it will be on, please please please post it for us all to see. I want to make sure my entire weekend is free, i miss this mode so bad and its never comes on.

Can any mod/aficionado/rioter give any form of insight as to when this mode will be active next?

This is me every rotation weekend that urf has not come up . . {{champion:32}}

That said, if you don't enjoy it, it's easy for you to not play it ;)

hes not wrong though, with urf you pretty much perm ban the same 6 champs then there's 10 more who get 100% picked because if you dont pick those your not going to win. urf is cancerous and probably riots worst game mode, however for the same reason why people like yasuo so much they like urf its over the top and "action packed" doesn't matter if your shit at the game cus its urf

I would just like to know when they plan to actually put it in the rotating queue.

Never played doom bots either but the videos I've seen it looks like great fun.
